root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX: Spirit Caller
root.description: Overview Yu-Gi-Oh GX Spirit Caller (Spirit Summoner in Japan) is an entry in the Yu-Gi-Oh GX series developed and published by Konami for the Nintendo DS in 2006. Spirit Caller is the first entry in the Yu-Gi-Oh GX series to feature support for the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.
